incidents.name: Incorrect Status of Ported Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing phone number status issues during the porting process. The incident has been resolved
We are no longer experiencing phone number status issues during the porting process. The incident has been resolved

For current porting processes, the Phone Number status is now showing correctly. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We’ll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Customers may see their numbers as “active” on their Twilio accounts, even though the actual porting process has not been completed. This could lead to confusion regarding the porting date of their numbers, but there is no reported service disruption for the customers with their current carriers. incidents.name: Task Creation Failures in the Twilio Flex Console

incident_updates.body: Task creation in Twilio Flex was degraded for 4 hours and 29 minutes between 06:07 and 10:36 Pacific Time on 06/26/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced the error message “RoutingTarget Worker is not available for new Task”. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Super SIM Connectivity Loss For ~3% of Devices

incident_updates.body: At 15:55 PDT, we observed the loss of connectivity for ~3% of sessions. As of 17:31 PST, most of the affected devices have reconnected.

At 15:55 PDT, we observed the loss of connectivity for ~3% of sessions. The affected devices started to reconnect and we observe that as of 16:55 PDT, ~60% of the affected devices came back. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
